channel.title: Appimage not connecting to onion sites?
channel.description:
Not able to connection to onion sites when using Fireforx AppImage. Get "Server Not Found". Also tried LibreWolf AppImage.
Browser is connected to Tor (checked:check.torproject.org)
Browser can see clearnet sites.
But cannot access onion sites.
I can successfully access onion sites using Midori browser.

item.title: Appimage not connecting to onion sites?
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Whonix isn’t responsible for Firefox. Neither it recommends its use.

Use Tor Browser. Why? See:

Whonix – 22 Feb 21

Tor Browser Basics

Using Tor Browser in Whonix ™. Anonymity vs Pseudonymity, HTTPS Everywhere, Torbutton, Protection against dangerous JavaScript, NoScript, Tips, Update Tor Browser, Browser Plugins, Change Language

As for fixing that Firefox issue if you insist…

Whonix – 26 Dec 20

Please use Search Engines and see Documentation First

Please do not ask very basic questions because it will not work that way.

search term:

firefox block onion

Plenty of results. Unrelated to Whonix. https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Free_Support_Principle applies.

Read full topic
item.source: Appimage not connecting to onion sites?

item.title: Appimage not connecting to onion sites?
item.dc:creator: HulaHoop
item.description:
Title is misleading. Why not use the Tor Browser to do that? Is it the same thing with the Debian firefox-esr package?

Read full topic
